rows.label: tlk41310151_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, there!
You've done so much for me recently,
I can't thank you enough.

rows.label: tlk41310151_02_msg0002
rows.name:
So in the end, Da went back to
Trigo. He's living together with
my siblings now.

rows.label: tlk41310151_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I heard he's started making an honest
living. I think Ma would be proud...
